item.title: The elegence of complex numbers
item.description: Hey folks, today I want to write about a familiar topic in Higher mathematics, complex numbers, and in particular, the Euler’s formula. Complex Numbers show up in a number of different fields, like signal processing, electromagetism, quantum mechanics and many more. Though it’s a frequently occuring content, from what I’ve noticed, both the students and the experts are perplexed by complex numbers. For example, the beginners become puzzled by basic questions such as “What’s the meaning of $\sqrt{-1}$ ?
